Sequence Information.Function: Exhibits unusual shark repellent and surfactant properties. Forms voltage-dependent, ion-permeable channels in membranes. At high concentration causes cell membrane lysis.

Literature.Title: Melittin-like peptides from the shark-repelling defense secretion of the sole Pardachirus pavoninus.
Literature.Author: Kubota I.,Nakanishi K.,Tachibana K.,Thompson S.A.

Literature.Title: Solution structure of pardaxin P-2.
Literature.Author: Tachibana K.,Iwashita T.,Barrow C.J.,Norman D.G.,Zagorski M.G.
